body:
Yeah, which I'd do but I don't want to completely remove the real fox pics either. I suppose it will work for now, once there's more styling options I can re-add the old pics somewhere else.

Update: Editing guild banners seems to be broken right now. Every time I try to change it I get a 500 or a 504 error.
body_html:
Yeah, which I'd do but I don't want to completely remove the real fox pics either. I suppose it will work for now, once there's more styling options I can re-add the old pics somewhere else.

Update: Editing guild banners seems to be broken right now. Every time I try to change it I get a 500 or a 504 error.

body: I know how to display images from links. How do you get it uploaded to i.ruqqus other than when making the initial post? You were able to upload the updated and purple banners to i.ruqqus separately from the making of this post. While I can upload to something like imgur and use that link, the only way to get it uploaded to i.ruqqus is when you're creating a post. So how did you upload the new images apart from the original post?
body_html: I know how to display images from links. How do you get it uploaded to i.ruqqus other than when making the initial post? You were able to upload the updated and purple banners to i.ruqqus separately from the making of this post. While I can upload to something like imgur and use that link, the only way to get it uploaded to i.ruqqus is when you're creating a post. So how did you upload the new images apart from the original post?
